title: How to Make Chocolate Trifle

steps.headline: Cut the Swiss roll into 8 slices and lay in a large glass bowl.
Pour the pie filling over the Swiss roll slices.
Make up the jelly as directed and pour over the sponge and fruit.
Chill in the fridge until set.
Mix the cornflour, sugar and cocoa powder in a jug with a little of the milk.
Add the rest of the milk and stir.
Pour into a saucepan and bring to the boil stirring continuously.
Allow to thickened then leave the custard to cool before pouring it on the trifle.
Cover with clingfilm and chill in the fridge until required.
Before serving whisk up the cream, spread on the top of the trifle and decorate with grated chocolate.

text: Cut the Swiss roll into 8 slices and lay in a large glass bowl.  Pour the pie filling over the Swiss roll slices.  Make up the jelly as directed and pour over the sponge and fruit.  Chill in the fridge until set.  Mix the cornflour, sugar and cocoa powder in a jug with a little of the milk.  Add the rest of the milk and stir.  Pour into a saucepan and bring to the boil stirring continuously.  Allow to thickened then leave the custard to cool before pouring it on the trifle.  Cover with clingfilm and chill in the fridge until required.  Before serving whisk up the cream, spread on the top of the trifle and decorate with grated chocolate.  Finished.
